sentence: Breakfast was excellent variety of cold meats cheeses breads pastries cereals juices and a very good hot buffet
Breakfast was really nice and loads of choice
Excellent breakfast choices with well replenished breakfast and a clean dining room

Had a fantastic time in leeds and the hotel was in single room for four people two double beds very nice room and the pool and sauna were an added bonus breakfast was ok my only complaint was the car park fee
Breakfast was amazing at the buffet with lots of choice and good coffee
The staff were so friendly and helpful and the breakfast delicious
Nice hotel little bit out of town Christmas party next to reception was loud and not nice for family to walk on to after going out for meal
Breakfast was fantastic especially the pancakes
Lots of different types of breads and pasteries as well as a fully stocked hot buffet

Once we arrived we were taken back by the grand entrance reception and mezzanine staircase staff were very friendly and attentive allowing us into our room early as we arrived from the train 5 floors up the lift we came to our room greeted with floods of light and a very airy atmosphere large flatscren tv mini bar and plenty more everywhere we looked there was lovely little touches from chocolate mints on the bed to complimentary sleep easy pillow mist and bottled water
Food is good unles you are not a fan of English breakfasts rooms are cozy and you get 4 pillows plus two smaller one per bed
James kindly directed me to the bar on the first floor while I waited
The room was nice enough and plush compared to my home but the stay was spoiled by truly cold variant of a not breakfast
Apart from the breakfast the stay was enjoyable and I would defiantly stay again
did not have breakfast as it was not worth the money

Evening meal in the refurbished restaurant was good but a touch on the expensive sidestaf were excellent and attentive without being in your face drinks were extortionate almost £ 5 for a lemonadebreakfast was buffet stle OK
There is bar area with with sport TV
Fresh coffee and tea was on offer from a member of staff walking around the restaurant
Richard and Edna in the restaraunt were very atentative
I returned just before 2 pm and there was no rooms ready so I had a very nice lunch in the bar area

Due to the time taken to sort out the error we were called from the SPA reception saying we were late and 10 minutes would be knocked off our treatments We explained it was the fault of the bar bill error and luckily no time was deducted
If I had to be critical the breakfast was buffet style which meant the food had been sat out instead of made to order
Only problem was the ice machines were all out of order but the bar brought an ice bucket to room instead
I would have given the hotel a better rating if breakfast had been less of a disappointment
room breakfast stafno hot water for bath reported but could not fix reading light not working
The manager at breakfast was quite abrupt and the breakfast was OK but overpriced

We were at an all day music festival and it was a long hot day we arrived back at the hotel and I went to order from the room service menu as it was late this is when I realised my can of Tango which I had left near the kettle UNOPENED was nowhere to be seen
The room service menu is tiny like three things to choose from
I had to go looking for staff so as to get a breakfast

At breakfast the eggs beans and tomatoes were luke warm and bread rolls rock hardIf I was staying in a budget hotel this would n’t be acceptable but for a £ 17 breakfast expensive room and a supposedly higher end corporate hotel this was total disgusting
